head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths AHEARN, EDWIN JAMES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths AHEARN, EDWIN JAMES

block.p: AHEARN-Edwin James. Of Commack, NY on Oct. 16, 2000. Beloved husband of Carol. Loving father of Brian, Kevin, Patrick, and Michael. Adored grandfather of Lauren. Devoted son of Jane. Visiting Thursday and Friday 2-5 and 7-9 P.M. at Brueggemann Funeral Home, 522 Larkfield Road, East Northport. Funeral Mass Saturday 10:00 a.m. at Christ the King R.C.C., Commack. Cremation private.

AHEARN-Edwin James. Of Commack, NY on Oct. 16, 2000. Beloved husband of Carol. Loving father of Brian, Kevin, Patrick, and Michael. Adored grandfather of Lauren. Devoted son of Jane. Visiting Thursday and Friday 2-5 and 7-9 P.M. at Brueggemann Funeral Home, 522 Larkfield Road, East Northport. Funeral Mass Saturday 10:00 a.m. at Christ the King R.C.C., Commack. Cremation private.
